title: Probably Garamond, but which edition?
content:
Any guess on the typeface on [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803133901/http:/angela-moore.co.uk/) webseite?

thank you!
author: M Magazine

comments.content: Hi, it's Adobe Garamond Pro, you can see that in the source code.
my pleasure, don't forget to mark the post as solved
